product_of_mem_opens_injective:
theorem product_of_mem_opens_injective [t0_space X] : function.injective (product_of_mem_opens X) :=
  by
  intro x1 x2 h
  apply inseparable.eq
  rw [← inducing.inseparable_iff (product_of_mem_opens_inducing X), h]
#align product_of_mem_opens_injective product_of_mem_opens_injective
product_of_mem_opens_inducing:
theorem product_of_mem_opens_inducing : inducing (product_of_mem_opens X) :=
  by
  convert inducing_infi_to_pi fun (u : opens X) (x : X) => x ∈ u
  apply eq_induced_by_maps_to_sierpinski
#align product_of_mem_opens_inducing product_of_mem_opens_inducing
product_of_mem_opens_embedding:
theorem product_of_mem_opens_embedding [t0_space X] : embedding (product_of_mem_opens X) :=
  embedding.mk (product_of_mem_opens_inducing X) (product_of_mem_opens_injective X)
#align product_of_mem_opens_embedding product_of_mem_opens_embedding
eq_induced_by_maps_to_sierpinski:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⨅ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨅ , » -/
/-

theorem eq_induced_by_maps_to_sierpinski (X : Type _) [t : topological_space X] :
    t =
      «expr⨅ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨅ , »"
        (sierpinski_space.induced (· ∈ u)) :=
  by
  apply le_antisymm
  · rw [le_infᵢ_iff]
    exact fun u => continuous.le_induced (is_open_iff_continuous_mem.mp u.2)
  · intro u h
    rw [← generate_from_Union_is_open]
    apply is_open_generate_from_of_mem
    simp only [Set.mem_unionᵢ, Set.mem_setOf_eq, is_open_induced_iff']
    exact ⟨⟨u, h⟩, {true}, is_open_singleton_true, by simp [Set.preimage]⟩
#align eq_induced_by_maps_to_sierpinski eq_induced_by_maps_to_sierpinski
